casebody.data:
In the Matter of LARCHMONT PANCAKE HOUSE, Appellant,
v.
BOARD OF ASSESSORS, etc., et al., Respondents. (And Three Other Proceedings) Motion No: 2018-276 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided May 8, 2018

Motion by Stop & Shop for leave to appear amicus curiae on the motion for leave to appeal herein granted and the brief is accepted as filed.
